caption.title: Absolute flows (gWWm −2month −1) produced by the different functional group at trophic level 3.
caption.p: Mean ± SE values per mesocosm are given ( n = 3). Significant interactions or main effects ( p < 0.05) within functional groups are based on two-way ANOVAs (df = 1,8) and are indicated with asterisks. Means with different lowercase letters indicate significant difference among treatments based on posthoc tests corrected for false discovery rate and done separately for different functional groups. No Sig = no significance. See S5 Table for statistical test outcomes.
